resources.string: Sorry, but \'%s\' needs really access to your notifications. You have to add these access in your phone preferences!
store it now and init a test notification

+++ NEW FINGERPRINT MAYBE BAD +++
%s

Make formular field clear to store new fingerprint.

Caution! The creation of a forwarding should not lead to a loop! Sending notifications to a Jabber account that has a client set up on this phone can lead to endless new notifications! In this case you can e.g. switch off the mobile phone, remove the SIM card or select the flight mode to reconfigure the app.
Notifications could be sent to another phone via sms. Attention! DO NOT BUILD LOOPS! It should really be another phone!
After how many letters should a sms cut off?\n\n0 = no cut
How many (multipart) sms should be send a day?\n\n0 = unlimited
